American Artists Congress: "Dear Comrade Trachtenberg..." from L.N. [Hollywood Unit Buro] re: Stanley Rose Bookstore [Rose was the Hollywood, CCA representative of the AAC, and his bookstore is alleged to be a gathering place for anti-communist leftists]
